column3: Student was asked to knock on the classroom door instead of banging on it. Did not comply and threw basketball. Took off mask and began spitting in the hallway. Support was called and he was put in a small child hold in hallway. Taken to TO. Small child and escort ( ). TO

column3: X did not want to complete math work. He pulled out his phone and started to use it. He was reminded that he can not use. He ran from the classroom and bean climbing on tables. He took off his mask and started taunting another student. He was escorted to TO. Escort TO
